'''Purpur pillars''' are decorative [[block]]s that can be crafted with purpur slabs and are naturally generated in [[End cities]] and [[End ship]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Purpur pillars can be [[breaking|mined]] using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, it [[drops]] nothing.

{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Purpur Pillar|link=none|Pickaxe|Wood}}

=== Natural generation ===
Purpur pillars can be found naturally as part of the structure of [[End cities]] and [[End ship]]s.

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|B2= Purpur Slab
|B3= Purpur Slab
|Output= Purpur Pillar
|type=Building block
|foot=1
}}

=== Stonecutting ===
{{Stonecutting
|showname=1
|Purpur Block
|Purpur Pillar
}}

== Usage ==
Purpur pillars are primarily decorative [[block]]s, similar to other [[bricks|brick]]-type blocks. Purpur pillar blocks can be placed sideways, similar to [[log]]s or [[quartz pillar]] blocks.

=== Crafting ingredient ===

{{crafting usage}}

=== Note Blocks ===
Purpur pillar can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sound.
